code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faPlay}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import'./OrangeHelpHeader.css';import AuthContext from'../AuthContext/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrangeHelpHeader=()=>{const{togglePageListVisibility,isPageListVisible}=useContext(AuthContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:'OrangeHelpHeader__container',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{onClick:togglePageListVisibility,icon:faPlay,className:isPageListVisible?"play-icon":"play-icon icon_toggle"})});};export default OrangeHelpHeader;
